rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey. Pi doing just fine.
Busy with scouting for new talent.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Think it unlikely we ever find someone
with Nanakoori's caliber again, though...

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0004
rows.name:
One listen to her voice and Pi
already shiver with admiration...

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0005
rows.name:
It very sorry shame that we not able
to hear her any more.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0006
rows.name:
But Pi understand how important
that Nanakoori follow her heart.

rows.label: tlk42300115_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Will be supporting her no matter what
she choose to do with life.
